# [Interview #196: DragonCon Report - Isabel, Entry #24](https://www.theoryland.com/intvmain.php?i=196#24)

#### Question

Is one of the effects of the taint to lower the boundaries between past lives or is Rand a special case?

#### Robert Jordan

RAFO.
